titleStmt.title: Agnoia tou psychikou anthrōpou, or, The inability of the highest improved naturall man to attaine a sufficient and right knowledge of indwelling sinne discovered in three sermons, preached at St. Marie's in Oxford / by Henry Hurst ...
titleStmt.author: Hurst, Henry, 1629-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hall ... for Richard Davis,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
